column1: Source: Environment Agency; Scottish Environment Protection Agency; Environment and Heritage Service.

column2: Figures before 1999 not comparable to figures after 1999. Before 1999, English and Welsh figures include some substantiated water
pollution incidents which were assessed as having no impact on the water environment. From 1999 only substantiated water pollution
incidents with an impact on the water environment are included.
1991 figure includes broad estimates for unavailable data.
Data for all years relate to financial years.
Includes some water pollution incidents which have no significant environmental impact.
